torchts 0.0.1

Parse time series formula

torchts_parse_formula.Rd

First version returns 3 types of variables:

  • outcome

  • predictor

  • index

torchts_parse_formula(formula, data)

Details

If no predictor is defined, every outcome variable is treated as a predictor

Examples

library(dplyr)
library(torchts)

tarnow_temp <-
  weather_pl %>%
  filter(station == "TARNÓW") %>%
  select(date, max_temp = tmax_daily, min_temp = tmin_daily)

View(torchts_parse_formula(max_temp ~ max_temp +index(date), tarnow_temp))

#> Error in torchts_parse_formula(max_temp ~ max_temp + index(date), tarnow_temp): nie udało się znaleźć funkcji 'torchts_parse_formula'
View(torchts_parse_formula(max_temp ~ date, tarnow_temp))

#> Error in torchts_parse_formula(max_temp ~ date, tarnow_temp): nie udało się znaleźć funkcji 'torchts_parse_formula'

debugonce(torchts_parse_formula)

#> Error in debugonce(torchts_parse_formula): nie znaleziono obiektu 'torchts_parse_formula'

# This example is not working
View(torchts_parse_formula(max_temp + min_temp ~ max_temp + min_temp + index(date), tarnow_temp))

#> Error in torchts_parse_formula(max_temp + min_temp ~ max_temp + min_temp +     index(date), tarnow_temp): nie udało się znaleźć funkcji 'torchts_parse_formula'
View(torchts_parse_formula(max_temp + min_temp ~ max_temp + index(date), tarnow_temp))

#> Error in torchts_parse_formula(max_temp + min_temp ~ max_temp + index(date),     tarnow_temp): nie udało się znaleźć funkcji 'torchts_parse_formula'
View(torchts_parse_formula(min_temp ~ max_temp + date, tarnow_temp))

#> Error in torchts_parse_formula(min_temp ~ max_temp + date, tarnow_temp): nie udało się znaleźć funkcji 'torchts_parse_formula'
